definition: Jiulongpo district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
Jiulongpo district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan

sentences.english: Towards dawn we found ourselves ascending the Nine-Dragon Slope five kilometres from home.
sentences.chinese: 快天亮時，我們已在爬離家五公里遠的九龍坡了。

sentences.english: After that, we take the moving event of Jiulongpo in Chongqing as case study.
sentences.chinese: 之後又以重慶九龍坡拆遷事件作爲案例研究。
